Faction.Name: Adventurer
Faction.Description: Members of the guild of adventurers

Buff2.Description: The first concern of any adventurer is surviving the next encounter.

Buff3.Description: The best defense is a strong offense. Well maintained weapons helps keep an adventurer alive.

Buff4.Description: The longest surviving adventurers are those who can take the largest beatings.

Buff5.Description: Studying your enemies is an core component of adventurer life.
